title: Spice Kraft JLT
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Indian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out
description: A vegetarian restaurant with vegan options. Menu reflects the diversity of vegetarian food from India, steeped in the classics, including tandoor, paneer, vegetables, and chaat, in addition to modern day cuisine.
streetAddress: Shop 5/6, Platinum Tower, Cluster - I, Jumeirah Lake Towers
